overview: After losing control of his engines, bumbling spaceman Fripp finds himself at the mercy of his spaceship. A thrilling descent through an asteroid belt ensues, after which he finds himself marooned on a post-apocalyptic Earth. Without a working spacecraft, the interstellar time-traveler must dip into the dead planetâ€™s history in order to find a way home.
tagline: Stranded in Space, but not in Time...
title: Time Trap
